title: AssertionError: 22050 vs 48000
body:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 724, in <module>
    main(args)
  File "train.py", line 638, in main
    train_loss, global_step = train(model, criterion, criterion_st,
  File "train.py", line 145, in train
    for num_iter, data in enumerate(data_loader):
  File "C:\Users\MWX\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python38\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 345, in __next__
    data = self._next_data()
  File "C:\Users\MWX\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python38\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 856, in _next_data
    return self._process_data(data)
  File "C:\Users\MWX\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python38\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 881, in _process_data
    data.reraise()
  File "C:\Users\MWX\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python38\lib\site-packages\torch\_utils.py", line 394, in reraise
    raise self.exc_type(msg)
AssertionError: Caught AssertionError in DataLoader worker process 0.
Original Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\MWX\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python38\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\_utils\worker.py", line 178, in _worker_loop
    data = fetcher.fetch(index)
  File "C:\Users\MWX\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python38\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\_utils\fetch.py", line 44, in fetch
    data = [self.dataset[idx] for idx in possibly_batched_index]
  File "C:\Users\MWX\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python38\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\_utils\fetch.py", line 44, in <listcomp>
    data = [self.dataset[idx] for idx in possibly_batched_index]
  File "D:\TTS\datasets\TTSDataset.py", line 166, in __getitem__
    return self.load_data(idx)
  File "D:\TTS\datasets\TTSDataset.py", line 112, in load_data
    wav = np.asarray(self.load_wav(wav_file), dtype=np.float32)
  File "D:\TTS\datasets\TTSDataset.py", line 70, in load_wav
    audio = self.ap.load_wav(filename)
  File "D:\TTS\utils\audio.py", line 257, in load_wav
    assert self.sample_rate == sr, "%s vs %s"%(self.sample_rate, sr)
AssertionError: 22050 vs 48000


During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

  File "train.py", line 732, in <module>
    remove_experiment_folder(OUT_PATH)
  File "D:\TTS\utils\generic_utils.py", line 80, in remove_experiment_folder
    shutil.rmtree(experiment_path)
  File "C:\Users\MWX\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python38\lib\shutil.py", line 737, in rmtree
    return _rmtree_unsafe(path, onerror)
  File "C:\Users\MWX\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python38\lib\shutil.py", line 615, in _rmtree_unsafe
    onerror(os.unlink, fullname, sys.exc_info())
  File "C:\Users\MWX\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python38\lib\shutil.py", line 613, in _rmtree_unsafe
